entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.4
entry.content:
This update is recommended for all users.

ğŸ PDF image preview generation fix. ğŸ›  Efficient search with inverted index. After updating visit /settings/account and click "Build Search Index" to enable this feature (works only with PostgreSQL).

Pro ğŸ†• Completed embedded document can now be authenticated using JWT with expiration (data-token).
